q: why do they wear helmets in this competition
pred: In the video, the riders are wearing helmets to protect themselves from potential injuries during the competition. Helmets are essential for ensuring the safety of the riders, as they can significantly reduce the risk of head injuries in case of falls or collisions. The riders are also wearing other protective gear such as gloves, knee pads, and elbow pads to minimize the risk of injuries to other body parts. These measures are crucial for ensuring the well-being of the riders and maintaining a safe environment for the competition.
